screen.second-headline: Transform your health journey with personalized workouts, nutrition tracking, and progress insights
screen.third-headline: Your personal fitness and nutrition companion
screen.goal-disc: Define your fitness and health objectives and let us create a personalized plan to help you reach them faster.
screen.progress-disc: Visualize your journey with detailed charts, body measurements, and achievement milestones.
screen.notif-disc: Get personalized reminders, celebrate achievements, and stay consistent with your fitness routine.
screen.notice-disc: For now, your data is stored locally on your device. In the future, we’ll add cloud sync — but until then, uninstalling the app or clearing its cache will erase your progress.

userInfo.headline: Let's start with your Personal info
